p1: We’re Galeriq—the all-in-one app that transforms how you plan and enjoy your events. We believe every celebration should be unique and hassle-free. That’s why we bring everything into one place: from creating your event, tracking tasks, and managing budget & expenses, to designing custom invitations and tracking your guests with real-time RSVP.
p2: With Galeriq, you can also create collaborative albums where guests share photos and videos of every special moment—building memories together. Our mission is to simplify the complex: make planning, organizing, and sharing your event as exciting as experiencing it.
